summary: Raised in Harlem, Tommy Gibbs becomes a successful mob boss but he clashes with the rival Mafia and his old enemy, dirty cop McKinney.
cast: Fred Williamson|Gloria Hendry|Art Lund|D'Urville Martin|Julius Harris|Minnie Gentry|Philip Roye|William Wellman Jr.|James Dixon|Val Avery|Patrick McAllister|Don Pedro Colley|Myrna Hansen|Omer Jeffrey|Michael Jeffrey|Allan Bailey|Cecil Alonzo|Francisco De Gracia|Larry Lurin|Andrew Duggan|Woni Spotts
title: El padrino de Harlem
